title: Cured river trout, Jersey Royal crisps, ricotta and preserved lemon
description: Fresh flavours such as lemon, peas and ricotta are used to balance any earthiness found in the trout.
serves: Serves 2 as a main, or 4 as a starter
ingredients: 1 rainbow trout, filleted, skin-on, pin boned
1 lemon, finely sliced on a mandoline
4 Jersey Royal potatoes, finely sliced on a mandolin
